pullrequest.title: Adding GameState class and tests to default branch

content.raw:
I just created a new pull request #3 for having code coverage information.

@jasonzliang, could you make sure that we have at least 90% of coverage in all the functions introduced in this pull request? This is the minimum standard that we're trying to achieve for Gazebo.
